Answer this Question This question is open with pending answers, but none have been accepted yet try this one : No Random Encounter Up+A+B=ON Down+A+B=OFF I think Left+A+B=Instant Encounter 94000130 FFBC0000 1218A460 00000001 D0000000 00000000 94000130 FF7C0000 1218A460 00000000 D0000004 00000000 94000130 FFDC0000 1218A460 00000002 D0000000 00000000 9218A460 00000001 0218A558 00000000 0218B55C 00000000 D0000000 00000000 9218A460 00000002 0218A558 FFFFFFFF 0218A55C FFFFFFFF D2000000 00000000 hope it works for you. :) 3 years ago 0 0 True_DK_47 answered: Answers I have tried some where around 4 to 6 other codes and none of them work and one of them froze my game. 4 years ago What is the action replay code for
